short_summary: The project includes the replacement of two complete pergolas and canopies at the entrances of the Chancery and Official Residence, and the repair and restoration of one additional pergola and canopy.
description: His Majesty the King in right of Canada, represented by the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD), is initiating a process to prequalify contractors for the replacement of pergolas and canopies at the Embassy of Canada to China in Beijing. Interested suppliers are required to respond to this Request for Qualifications. Only those Respondents considered by DFATD to meet the prequalification requirements as defined in this document will be invited to submit competitive bids for this work during the Request for Proposal phase of the solicitation.
full_summary:
**Replacement of Pergolas and Canopies at the Embassy of Canada to China in Beijing**
================================----

### Tender Announcement

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01027760  
**Publication Date:** February 27, 2023  
**Tender Closing Date:** March 14, 2023 at 02:00 PM (EST)  
**Status:** Expired  

### Project Overview

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is seeking prequalified contractors for the replacement of pergolas and canopies at the Embassy of Canada to China in Beijing. The project involves the removal, supply, and installation of three sets of pergolas and canopies, including two complete sets at the entrances of the Chancery and Official Residence, and one additional set for repair and restoration.

### Scope of Work

- Removal, supply, and installation of two complete pergolas and canopies
- Repair and restoration of one additional pergola and canopy
- Work includes the replacement of cracked acrylic sheets covers/skylights

### Requirements

- Ability to provide services in English or French
- Ability to travel to and perform work in Beijing, China

### Eligibility Criteria

- Respondents must meet the prequalification requirements as defined in this document
- Capability to provide the full range of services required for the project

### Contracting Entity

- Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD)
- Address: 125 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0G2, Canada

### Contact Information

- Eric Rainville
- Email: [realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca](mailto:realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca)
- Phone: +1 343 572 7269

### Tender Documentation

- The tender document, including the Request for Qualifications (RFQ) and supporting information, can be downloaded from the Canada Buys website: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/27/1b1336e9534dd55d92a591ce127f9153/22-216818_-_beijing_-_replacement_of_pergolas_and_canopies_-_rq.pdf (English) / https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/27/1c6444183c4a0f546190d22d244f8cf1/22-216818_-_beijing_-_remplacement_de_perg
